mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_Upload_File ( fileNameOrig , fileNameTemp , contentType , fileSize ) VALUES ( #{fileNameOrig}, #{fileNameTemp}, #{contentType}, #{fileSize} )

INSERT INTO TB_Upload_File ( fileNameOrig , fileNameTemp , contentType , fileSize ) VALUES
#{item.fileNameOrig}, #{item.fileNameTemp}, #{item.contentType}, #{item.fileSize}
